video.title: Wildlife Specials
video.synopsis: Naturalist David Attenborough travels to stunning locations and gets up-close footage of polar bears, leopards and other amazing creatures.

episodes.synopsis: Regarded by many as one of the most fearsome predators in existence, the polar bear comes into focus, up close and personal. Attenborough shows us both the savagery of their hunting techniques and the tenderness of their familial relationships.
episodes.title: Polar Bear: Arctic Warrior

episodes.synopsis: Dive below the surface to get an up-close glimpse at crocodiles, the seemingly lethargic lumps that can suddenly spring into lethal action, overwhelming prey in an instant. But these crocs also share their softer, more social side with the cameras.
episodes.title: Crocodile: Smiling Predator

episodes.synopsis: State-of-the-art technology allows us unprecedented access to the nocturnal world of leopards, creatures that rely on their sharp senses of smell and hearing to capture prey. Rare glimpses of domestic life also shed light on mating and rearing cubs.
episodes.title: Leopard: Agent of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: New techniques in cinematography allow us to soar with eagles, observing their predatory capabilities and aerial attacks on everything from monkeys to kangaroos. Attenborough also affords us an unexpected glimpse of the awesome bird's nurturing side.
episodes.title: Eagle: Master of the Skies

episodes.synopsis: The oft-romanticized songs of the humpback whale are revealed for what they really are: a blunt instrument in the war for sexual dominance, as the bulls of the species engage in combat that sometimes puts females and their calves in danger.
episodes.title: Humpback Whale: Giant of the Oceans

episodes.synopsis: Constant persecution throughout the ages has caused wolves to avoid contact with humans. Attenborough travels to Canada, Romania and the Arctic to examine these misunderstood beasts' true nature as tender, loyal caretakers.
episodes.title: Wolf: Legendary Outlaw

episodes.synopsis: Attenborough tours all seven continents to bring us glimpses of the earth's greatest natural wonders and explain how they were formed. Locations include Death Valley in California, the ice caves of Europe and Angel Falls in South America.
episodes.title: Great Natural Wonders of the World

episodes.synopsis: The celebrated naturalist treks across the globe to show us the incredible biodiversity that surrounds us throughout the seasons, including Japanese cranes in late winter, Alaskan grizzly bears in the summer and African wildebeest in the fall.
episodes.title: Greatest Wildlife Show on Earth
